channel.title: Scribble.rs
channel.description: A blog with news about the Scribble.rs project.

item.title: Welcome to the Scribble.rs blog
item.description: A blog with news about the Scribble.rs project.
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to our new blog!

From time to time we'll be posting interesting updates about the project here.

In order to stay updated, you can subscribe to our RSS feed over at https://scribble-rs.github.io/feed.xml.
